judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Common Pleas Court denying post-conviction relief is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Stephen D. Bprenhle and Leo J. Kelly, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Allen, Appellant.
Submitted September 24, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Stephen D. Bprenhle and Leo J. Kelly, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 25, 1974:
